channel.title: How can i change a max hit
channel.description:
I got a rune crossbow & it doesn't hit very high, i was wondering if someone could help me to change it to hit a 60
Regards, James

item.title: How can i change a max hit
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

client.java and search for maxRangeHit If you want to change max hit of pvp combat, and maxRangeHit2 If you want to change the max hit of npc combat.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change a max hit
